user.description:
This integration fetches weather data from the Open Data server of Deutscher Wetterdienst. By using this integration, you agree to the terms at https://opendata.dwd.de/README.txt.

Based on your Home Assistant configuration, a station was suggested below. Feel free to try out different ones until you find the best one for you. The distance and difference in elevation to your home location is displayed for each station.

If you want to configuare a station manually, select "Custom...".

name.description: You can keep the default name of the station or change it here.
